mapper.sql: id, user_id, grade, unit_id, course_id, `month`, week, `type`, update_time
mapper.select: select course.id courseId,`time`.unit_id unitId,`time`.user_id userId , if(course.grade_ext=null or course.grade_ext='',course.grade_ext,course.grade ) grade, if(course.label_ext=null or course.label_ext='',course.label_ext,course.label ) label, `time`.type `type` from school_time `time` join course_new course on course.id=`time`.course_id where `time`.week=#{week} and `time`.`month`=#{month} and type=1

select course.id courseId,`time`.unit_id unitId,`time`.user_id userId , if(course.grade_ext=null or course.grade_ext='',course.grade_ext,course.grade ) grade， if(course.label_ext=null or course.label_ext='',course.label_ext,course.label ) label, `time`.type `type` from school_time `time` join course_new course on course.id=`time`.course_id where `time`.week=#{week} and `time`.`month`=#{month} and type=2 and user_id=#{studentId}
select count(id) from school_time where type=2 and user_id=#{studentId}

select count(course.id) from school_time plan join course_new course on plan.course_id = course.id where (course.grade =#{grade} or course.grade_ext =#{grade}) and (course.label=#{label} or course.label_ext=#{label}) and type = #{type} and user_id=#{userId}
